comments.body: We should have a test where there is only one partition and that must be chosen.  We should also have a test of what happens when some of the partitions are not available (unavailable partitions should not be chosen, unless they are all unavailable)
I did include the test for one partition here, but I can include a test for unavailable partitions.
@jolshan @cmccabe Please review this change to the StickyPartitionCacheTest.

It seems that those extra <String> lines are in DefaultPartitionerTest as well. (That is where I got the line from.)
Also, this is more of a question for myself to understand, but what is the fourth node for?
